profile.biography: I am an allround web developer. I am a senior programmer with good knowledge of front-end technics. I love structure and order and I also stand for quality. I love spending time on fixing little details or optimizing web apps. Also working in a team is what I like, you'll learn faster and more. As the saying says: 'two head are better than one'.

educations.title: Avans Highschool
educations.description: I've got a bachelors' degree in ICT. I was taught Java, SQL, PHP, MVC and UML. During my time in college, I specialized in multimedia. Here I learned about gaming -the importance of OOP-, web- and user experience and design.

educations.title: Rodenborch
educations.description: I graduated highschool, where I enjoyed doing science, math, biology and arts. I realized in my third year of school that I wanted to do something with websites, and so I started making small flash/actionscript applications.

careers.title: Whoopaa / HRMatches
careers.description: Whoopaa is a startup which began as a social platform where private and business were separated. This idea didn't exceed to our expectations and we turned Whoopaa in to a job matching platform, were Whoopaa became the employee side and HRMatches the employer side. With certified tests and an unique matching algorithm we turn this into a new product. Me and one of my colleagues build our own framework, which I improved in use and speed after the big product change. I also developed the real time match algorithm as well as a lot of other algorithms. Whoopaa is my current job.

careers.title: SOAP - Independent Hair Designers
careers.description: SOAP is a local hairdresser in 's-Hertogenbosch. I design, develope and manage their website. Every couple years I re-design their site and I recently updated their CMS to Wordpress, combined with a custom made Bootstrap theme - to make it completely responsive.

careers.title: C2K internet solutions
careers.description: Right after I graduated, I started working for C2K: a full service internet agency. I developed a homemade CMS, CRM and e-mail marketing system. The CMS was used for a dozens of clients, as well as the e-mail marketing system. I also did a lot of custom made web sites/applications. Later on I also developed Layars like: Conquar (a digital adaption of the board game of Risk), Gowalla (based on Gowalla's API). C2K no longer exists.

careers.title: Davinci Advies Groep
careers.description: My second internship and the place I eventually graduated, was at Davinci. I investigated new web-technologies they could possibly use to improve the front-end of their java-based CRM system. I, amongst other technologies, compared Adobe Flex, Silverlight, Ruby on Rails to each other, to find out which could work best for the company. Based on the results of my research, the company eventually decided to use the ZK Framework.

careers.title: Sanitairwinkel.nl
careers.description: At sanitairwinkel.nl, I improved/expanded the current webapplication and re-factored the code. I also created a brand new back-end system and improved the front-end by giving it a new look and feel. I also improved the website's SEO.

careers.title: Goomla.com
careers.description: After my internship ended I was asked to stay as part-time employee. Goomla became partner of the year of Bol.com. In october 2007 Goomla was sold to Daisycon.

careers.title: Goomla.com
careers.description: I did my first internship at a company named Goomla. There I learned to apply my knowledge of PHP. Goomla was a shopping/comparison-site, with more than 100 affiliates including bol.com, wehkamp, neckermann, to name a few.

interests.title: Sports
interests.description: I can't life without sports. In the weekend you will find me riding on my mountainbike, or you can become friends on runkeeper. Through the week I go to the gym or to the track to train for pole vault. The adrenaline does me well!

interests.title: Music
interests.description: I can listen to music all day. I have a wide taste of music and I listen to it at my work, during sports, when I ride my bike, in the train, etc. I play guitar myself and love to own a drumkit one day.

interests.title: My Cats
interests.description: If you look up my social networks, you'll surely come across one of my cats. Because what is Internet without cats? Nothing right! And I'm a internet man, so one plus one makes two.

interests.title: Algorithms
interests.description: I love riddles, solving problems, building things and of course lego. Maybe I don't find the perfect solution at first, but for a lot of problems/questions/plans I will find a solution, which I want to optimize to a better solution. The satisfaction I get after solving a hurdle can really make my day.

interests.title: Travel
interests.description: When I was 19 I flew by plain for the first time, after that I got hooked. I went to America two times, Surinam, Greece, Malta, Canary Islands and more. But as much I love the sun and culture, I also love to go to the alps for some snowboarding.
